text:
Fatherhood looks good on NIck Lachey. Nick Lachey and his loving wife Vanessa Lachey's partnership is built on "sharing the load" and "delegating the responsibility." He usually takes on mornings, while Vanessa tackles getting the kiddos ready for bed. "We have a whole routine with a story, getting them ready with the sound machine, obviously singing lullabies, and, of course, the Pampers Baby Dry," Nick explained, mentioning their go-to line of Pampers diapers.

Caption: Vanessa and Nick with their children.
